Name: MIRAGE
About the game: MIRAGE : Music Visualizer for Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. (Non-VR also supported). Witness the reflections of sound across a visual landscape. PLAY MUSIC FROM ANY MUSIC PLAYER AND MIRAGE WILL REACT. MIRAGE features advanced audio analysis to bring out the best of your music. New packs are added frequently and can be downloaded through the menu. Music never looked this good.
